0 B=100:C=127:D=1:PMODE2,1:SCREEN1,1:
1 FORZZ=1TO10:PCLS:GOSUB9
2 IFINKEY$=""THEN2
3 NEXT:
4 GOTO4

9 READT,A,G,Q:IFT=99THENRETURN
10 LINE(C+T/D,B+A/D)-(C+G/D,B+Q/D),PSET:GOTO9
